main event: A UFO sighting was reported near Saginaw, Michigan on August 6, 1955, involving one rectangular white object.
interesting points: The sighting lasted for 1 hour and 12 minutes,The object was described as the size of a baseball held at arm's length,The object was seen to move slightly,There were daily balloon releases by the University of Minnesota and General Mills in Mobile, Minnesota,All released balloons were drifting in the general direction of the sighting.
